text: Bottle. Reddish, slightly misted. Aroma: berry, sauerkraut, sourish. Taste: sour, berries, sour, refreshing, citrus, juicy.

33cl bottle at home. Murky greyish dark pink with a thin off-white head that disappears in an instant. Notes of raspberries, lemonade, lime, lemon zest, salt, yeasty tartness, yogurt, sauerkraut. Medium body and carbonation and a tart, refreshing finish.
Thnx to Bram . Pours unclewr peachy red. Small white head. Smell is dry, bit sour, mild fruityness. Taste is dry, full , fruity, intense, mild yet clear sourness. Very nice
Wstyd 콮e jeszcze nie oceni켹em. Malinowe, kwa콑ne, waniliowo-mleczne smoothie. Totalna pyszno콑캖 i orze콬wienie. Polecam fanom dobrych rzeczy.

3.5% version - Opaque, deep red-brown colour with a small fine off white head. Aromas of mineral, raspberry, wet wood, earthy notes develop. Fine carbonation, mild texture with an airy body offering a nice balance between light brisk fruity sweetness, sourness and a minerally salt touch. Short refreshing finish. Enjoyable!

bomber shared. first off I am not a real sourhead. but this poured a light pink/red color with white head and lots of carbonation. aroma was typical gose/sour smell it in the nose. lemon raspberries, tart, sour, acrid, tickled the hell out of my tastebuds immediately. not a fan but it was good. as it warmed up some the different fruits could be tasted. nice touch.

Bottle 0,33. Pours hazy amber with small white head. Clearly raspberries, a bit lactose, for some reason tomatoes come to my mind. Medium to light body and soft carbonation. Quite good in the summer I would imagine.

UPDATED: FEB 20, 2017 Bottle thanks to Bob. Hazy red with a small diminishing white head. Lemon, raspberry, butyric acid, hay, dry flowers, vanilla. Light body, mild sweet, medium sour. Fruity finish.
On tap at the Beer Trappe into a snifter. Aroma of raspberries with some wheat.
Sweet raspberries everywhere, overwhelms everything, very light metallic, medium malic+lactic sourness, light spiciness.

Bomber listed at 6%abv. Pours a hazy raspberry pink with a finger of carnation colored foam that dissipates quickly. Faint raspberry skin with blueberry and yogurt on the nose. Great carbonation. Drinks like 3% abv. Lots of juicy, tart raspberry...bone dry and fruity with a lightly tart finish. Another hit from Omnipollo.

330 mL bottle. Light pink body. Mostly clear. Smells of raspberry, lemon, yogurt. Tastes of raspberry, sharp lemon tartness. A little bit of lactose. Sour raspberry finish with a bit of salt. Light body. Nice, but not up to the standard of the Blueberry version.
Not a bad gose. Not sure what the lactose adds, but it has a nice balance between raspberry sweetness and a light funk.
hazy pink. I can뇺 smell anything because there뇹 ice cream on it. had to clear that out of the way. tastes like sweet raspberry. acidic, tart, pineapple finish with pepper and salt.
Bottle from Cap Tap. Pours light red with a tiny transient pink head and a pleasant raspberry aroma. There is a moderately sour raspberry flavor and a tart oaky finish.

Bottle shared by Marcus. Pours clear rose with a slight pinkish head. Light raspberry aroma. Med minus body. Flavor is lightly sweet, somewhat salty, definitely raspberry. Maybe a lactic note, but it뇹 not sour for me. Salty tho.
Gremlin bottle share. Lovely raspberry aroma, juice like, touch of cranberry. Taste, is good, lightly spiritzy, berries, juice again. Light milkiness. Good stuff.

Hazy reddish colour with small off white head.Arpma is fruity of raspberrys and acid,but sweet and malt salty fresh and with good mild bitterness,mouthfeels is sour and tart but overall this is not bad.

Aroma: raspberry, leaves, onion
Taste: heavy sour, raspberry, leaves, light saltu

330ml bottle [3.5% abv]. Opaque, oxblood red colour with small, frothy, widely fading, minimally lacing, off-white head. Superb raspberry aroma displays the full spectrum of sweet-ish, tart, fruity, earthy and leafy notes, additional hints of bramble yoghurt, black currant. Taste is tart, fruity, notes of red and blue berries, especially bramble, black currant and raspberry, eathy and leafy aspects not excluded; prickling palate. Very good.

330 ml bottle at home. Hazy pink red color with pinkish head. Malty and yeasty aroma, tart fruity, raspberries, lactic notes, light floral spicy and citrusy fruity. Sweet, light acidic and light salty taste like aroma. Light thin to oily body with soft carbonation.

Aroma:

Medium/heavy aroma of malts, lactose, strawberry, raspberry, salt, citrus and tart.

Appearance:

Opaque pink/red beer with a slight/medium pink head.

Taste/Palate:

Starts medium sweet with malts, lactose, strawberry and raspberry; ends slightly bitter, dry, salty and sour with salt, citrus and tart.

Overall:

This beer is intense, complex and balanced. So many flavours in this beer, sipping is the only way for me. Super strong and really weird aroma. Amazingly opaque appearance with an unique colour. Man this beer is truly great and definitely something else.

Bottle sample at a tasting at troubles뇹 place. Thanks zviSG. Cloudy red. Nice raspberry aroma, slightly lactic, a little bit of citrus. Very tarty taste, fruity-raspberry and acidic. Medium body, tarty, a little dry mouthfeel and acidic.

August 2016 - Bottle share at Chriso뇹 Pre-GBBF Shindig, Day 1. Thanks! As 뇚mnipollo Bianca Raspberry Lassi Gose. Pinky, opaque, hazy, foamy pinky head. Aroma is cherry and raspberry, rhubarb and red berry. Body is light, tingly carbonation, smooth. Taste is raspberry and red berries. Good. (3.7)

Bottle 330ml (3.5%) @ home
Pours hazy amber with a off-white head. Aroma has notes of raspberries, tartness and hint of strawberries with cream. Taste is light to medium sweet and medium sour with a long dry, raspberry, lactose and light salty finish. Body is light, texture is thin, carbonation is very fizzy

Shared from bottle at deanso뇹. Hazy reddish amber, small head. Sweet malts. Raspberries, , sour green apple, milky, sweet and sour berries. Medium sweet, light lactic sour. Medium body, soft carbonation. Fruity bittersweet finish.

33cl bottle shared.
No head. Cloudy red pour. A bit sur. Ok. Not my cp of tea.

Bottled from BierNavigatie.nl. Hazy red colored, light pinkish head. Massive fresh raspberry nose, lactic acid, yeasty. Very, very sour flavor, pretty dry too, raspberry, lactose. Quite some complexity, but the sourness is so overwhelming it뇹 difficult to enjoy it. I appreciate the effort, but it뇹 too extreme for me i뇴 afraid.

W aromacie malina i troche takie owoce troche nie dojrza켹e z ogr칩dka co콑 w stylu porzeczki, dodatkowo pachnie jakby pokrzywa, fajny aromat czuje sie jak na ogr칩dku albo u babci pij캔c jaki콑 kompocik

W smaku 콑rednio kwasne, bardziej czuje tutaj mimo wszystko cytryn캧 w posmaku wje콮d콮a malina 

Polecam bardzo dobre

22 oz bottle poured into a tulip. 6% ABV version. Slightly hazy reddish/pinkish color with thin light pink head. Aromas of raspberries, lemon, salt, some lactose. Tastes of juicy raspberries, big tart lemons, light salt, maybe a hint of lactose. Light body with a dry finish. Delicious and refreshing.
Draft sample. The beer is a hazy red with a white head of foam. Fairly herbal and a touch fruity. Sweet and herbal. A bit tart. Light body and medium carbonation.

From a bottle. Pours hazy burgundy red with a fizzy light pink head. Tastes like raspberry, pear, yeast, and lemon. Light body and low carbonation. Smells like raspberry, lemon, pear, and cracker malt.

Bottle. Pours a beautiful hazy raspberry color. Aroma is raspberries, wheat, faint salt, and very faint floral and spicy notes. Flavor is heavy tart raspberries, faint salt, and a touch of citrus hops with a slightly sticky finish. Light body.

0,33l bottle at home. BB 2017-04-01. redish quite cloudy color, small white head. smells herbal, light grapefruit, some berry notes, citric, bit funky. decent smell. light to medium body, medium carbonation, light mouthfeel. tastes citric, medium sour, berry notes, bit grapefruity, salty. finishes rather dry and sour with notes of raspberries and citric notes. quite nice one, very refreshing.
On tap at the CBC. Served with frothy / frozen soft serve on top! Pinkish reddish color with a frozen frothy soft serve head. Berries, raspberries with tart citrus. That soft serve head ...

Bottle at home (3.5% version). Pours a hazy pink with a small fizzy pink head. Aroma of raspberries, light salty, tart. Taste is moderate sour, light sweet, raspberries, lemon, light salty, quite dry finish, raspberry aftertaste. Very nice and refreshing.
On tap at Total Wine & More (Alexandria, VA). Aromas of tart berry candy, pink Nerds perhaps, lemon, briney. Hazy pink-red with a somewhat lasting white head. Very tart, fruity, briney. Light bodied.
Sample at KC Beerfest 2016. Comes a hazy pale red with a small off-white head. Aroma of raspberries and citrus. Taste is raspberries, lemon, and a hint of salt. Missed the mark for me.

Bottle from Astoria Bier & Cheese; shared with Linh and Scarlett. Pours a deep reddish pink body with thin bubbled, white lacing. Nose is tart raspberry, sour cherry and sour berries. Noticeable acid present on the nose and palate. Medium bodied with a nice assertive sour raspberry character.

Pre-GBBF 2016 tasting at Chris&Ruth뇹, Day-1. It pours a slightly clean ruby color with a small pink head. Aroma is tangy and fruity, with tart notes of Greek yoghurt and raspberries, lemon juice and straw. Taste is also tart and sour with notes of raspberries, lemon juice and straw. Light to medium bodied with good carbonation. Overall, top notch gose
Refrigerated brown bomber poured into a glass. Clear deep pink with small pink head. Aroma is raspberry, light body, low carbonation, and little lacing. Taste is brine and tart raspberry.

Bottle @ Guren. 3,5%. Pink red haze. Small head. Intense sour raspberry notes. Tart dry. Low bitterness. Salt ? Maybe. Fine and fresh. Went quick.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

6th August 2016The great ChrisO pre GBBF gathering. Hazy amber beer, thin pale cream colour head. Palate is light and crisp and dry. Sourish. Tangy orange and raspberry. Tangy citrus peel. Light fruity tangy finish.

Bottle at Dangerous bottleshares 20th edition. Pours cloudy pink with a white head. Aroma of raspberry, hops, lactic tartness, raspberry seeds and fruity smoothie. The taste has lots of tart raspberries, some lactic notes, slight hoppy and very juicy as well.
330mp bottle (thanks FatPhil). Small size, bubbly off-white head, stays. Vinegar, balsamico, raspberries, acidic in aroma. Raspberries, acidic, jammy in taste. Typical lacto jammy something.

330ml bottle (Pudel, Tallinn)
Pink, brief head. Cheap supermarket raspberry juice, watered down. Harsh sour salty watery fruit juice. Palate is watery and harshly acidic. No beer to be found here. I could just drop some S&V into a crappy macro radler and recreate this. The emperor has no clothes, this is just shit.
3.5%, matt r칮d med h칮yt hvitt skum som legger seg fort. Luktet b칝r, bringeb칝r skiller seg ikke ut. Noe gj칝r og korn. Sursyrlig b칝rsmak, og mye av den, og den varer.

330ml bottle. Pale pinkish red colour. Thin line of froth around the glass. Raspberries, acidity, slight saltiness, juiciness, redcurrants in the aroma. Sour raspberries at first. Sourness, slight saltiness, berries again in the middle. Redcurrants in the end. Sour raspberries and acidity in the aftertaste. Refreshing, rather lightbodied, quite well balanced gose.
Pours a bright pinkish purple with a thick pink head. Aroma of raspberries, sour wheat, lemon and funk. Taste follows, raspberry jam, sour wheat, salt, lemon and funk.

Bomber from Whole Foods PM. Pours turbid ruby/copper with splotchy white head. Nose is fresh raspberries right off the damned vine. Tastes tart, creamy, with fresh raspberry flavor, lactic tartness, and a creamy raspberry finish. Delicious.

Bottle. Pours hazy bright pink - hibiscus flower, small pink-white head, dissipates fairly slowly, good lacing. Aroma is sea air, raspberry, sour mash. Flavor is quite light tart, hints of salt and raspberries. Light body, soft carbonation. Quite pleasant.
Bottle shared at Todd뇹. Light pink in color with fruity raspberry tartness. Pretty decent.

UPDATED: DEC 8, 2016 330ml bottle at 3.5%. Pour is cloudy deep red. Aroma has plenty of raspberry but it뇹 got a savoury note that뇹 almost slightly sweaty. Taste is much cleaner, with a big tart note up front followed by lots of raspberry and a little salt. Very unusual, even for a gose. It뇹 really carbonated, which feels great in the mouth and really brings the tartness out. It뇹 a real shame the smell is so bad.
Bottle. Ruby pink pour with white head. Sweet, raspberry, fruity, light sour, salty aromas. Light salty, light sweet fruit, raspberry and sour tones.
Bottle - pours pink white head - nose/taste of raspberry, lactose, sour funky lemon and salt - medium body

Draft. Dark pink with thin white head. Hints of barnyard, hay, raspberries and a tart candy aroma. Tart, raspberry, creamy, and a hint salty. Very tasty, not too much berry or salt. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

33cl bottle. Light red and completely hazy with small head. Aroma is very fruity and acid. Evidently lactic acidity. And it뇹 easy to distinguish the dominating fruit which is raspberry. Nice. The beer is watery and has a medium carbonation. Flavor is dry and acid but above all ...fruity like hell. The acidity isn뇺 overwhelming. Overall well balanced and quite delicious. Well done.
Bottle shared at Chris and Ruth뇹 pre GBBF shindig; hazy peach pour with a bubbly white head, aroma has red berries, taste has raspberry, some soured yoghurt.

12.08 2016, 0,33l bottle @ home:
Nice fizzy-creamy mediumlasting head, slightly hazy reddish color. Aroma is fresh sour-ish, red currants, bark, pine needles, sour raspberries, minerals, berry skin, sorrel, soda powder, moss. Taste is sour-ish dry, red currants, sour raspberries, minerals, sorrel, soda powder, bark, berry skin, pine needles, moss. Medium bitterness, sour-ish mouthfeel. Very nice.

10th July 2016. Bottle (3.5% ABV) at RBESG Grand Tasting Part 2: Brew Pub Le Sec. How do you like your raspberries? This red, cloudy bodied beer has truck loads of them within it뇹 make-up. Greek Yogurt like with a salty feel, strange and interesting, but only if you like raspberries: I do.

Bottle @ home, from ICA. Pours a milk cloudy reddish liquid with a small pink head. Dry and slight acidic aroma with lactose, raspberries, grains, lemon, flowers, hints of vinegar and salt. Tart and acidic taste, highly carbonated, with lots of fresh raspberry flavor. Also salt, grain, lemon, orange zest, black currants. Lingering salt, raspberries and lactose.
Bottle. Pours hazy milky red with a big pink head. Aromas of raspberries, citrus, hops, floral, lactose. Taste is lactic, raspberries, citrussy, floral, lemony.
Pre shinding 2016. Tr칲bes orange pinkes Bier mit einer ordentlichen wei른n schaumkrone. Geruch nach frischen Himbeeren, minimal s칛uerlich, yoghurt. Geschmack s칛uerlich fruchtig, Himbeeren, Joghurt.

330ml bottle shared @Alebrowar Gdynia. 3.5% version.
Smells mostly of milk and raspberries. 
Pours cloudy raspberry red with some small white head that does not stay long.
Tastes of raspberries, a lot of them! Milk roundness. Salty
Soft Carbonation
I did like this one! Will look for a chance to put my hands on it again!
Bottle. Pin colour with pink head. Rapberry aroma. Sweet, raspberry, acidic taste, slightly sweet. Medium body.

Bottle shared at a tasting at troubles뇹 place. 3.5%. Lovely cloudy pinkish red. Great lactic aroma with yogurt, raspberries, and a bit of vanilla. Tart and slightly sweetish flavor, lactic, with yogurt, raspberries, a salty hint, and a light bitterish hint. Quite light-bodied. Great.

Bottle from Hemk칬p Gothenburg, 3,5% version. Reddish brown colour with minimal white head. All about the raspberries in this one, it feels in the aroma. Medium sour and medium dry. Lactoacid and raspberries in the taste, a bit salty. Got a nice medium body to it and the rapsberries keeps lingering in the mouth.

Bottle. Pink red color. Fantastic aroma of fresh raspberries, mild tart and sweet red fruit. Fresh taste of raspberry, tart, fresh funky sourness, subtle salt and a tart fruity finish. This is amazing, the raspberry really shines.

D뇨mpolla al Grand Tasting del RBESG16. Cervesa vermella amb aromes de fruites vermelles fresques que recorden a les mores, cireres o maduixes. En boca es presenta 맊ida tipus c칤tric i una mica dol칞a. Molt Bona!

33 cl bottle. Pours hazy amber with a small white head. Aroma is raspberry and smooth fruity. Citric, sourish and smooth fruity. Dry and crisp fruity. Dry and smooth fruity. Crisp and citrusy fruity finish.

Bottle from Uba ja Humal. BB 2017.04.01. 3.5%. Pours translucent pinkish red with a very brief pinkish white head. Aroma of raspberries, lactic... yoghurty... Tastes sweet, like home-made raspberry juice or smoothie. Finish is salty. Lingering raspberry. Sticky, and lightish on the palate. Somewhat harsh too. Gimmicky brew. I should stop buying stuff like this.

On tap at Nedre Foss G친rd, december 19th 2015. Cloudy pink orangetinted body with a medium offwhite head. Aroma of vanilla, raspberries, yougurt. Taste is tart and sour berries, mildly balancing vanilla, with flowery hops and a mild funky twist in the sour finish.

Bottle. Pours translucent pink hued orange, with a small creamy head. Aroma is lactic acid and tart, fresh raspberries. Probably somewhat like waking up under the shrubbery in a fabulous raspberry orhard. And lovin it. Also some musty notes of earth and whiffs of salt. Full body, with soft carbonation. Flavour is lactic acid and raspberries with some sweet pulp notes, as well fruit peel, sour candy and salt. A bit of a stretch for a Gose, but probably one of the very best salty lassis out there!

Bottle, 3,5%. Unclear dark red/ruby with tiny off-white head. Aroma is malt, raspberries, lemon and berries. Flavour is malt, raspberries, notes of salt, berries, little citric, little dry, medium sweet, lemon and a little sour.

Aromat cudownie owocowy, przypomina troch캧 malinowy sorbet, jest s켹odki i bardzo apetyczne. W tle nutka kwasu mlekowego. 
Smak 콑rednio kwa콑ny, wytrawny ale jest te콮 lekka s켹odycz i pewna mineralna nutka. W smaku kwa콑ne maliny, lekko czu캖 rabarbar i jogurtow캔 kwasowo콑ci. Posmak bardzo kr칩tki, wytrawny, pozostaje jedynie ulotna chmurka niedojrza켹ej maliny. Super!
Bottle from uba ja humal, tallinn. Deep red color, white head. Sour raspberries, fruits. Sour berry taste, fruits, very fresh and pure.
Virkelig en underlig 칮l. Den er syrlig og har et hint af hindb칝r. Men virkelig god som en sommer칮l og en 칮l ud over det s칝rlige!

Draught @ Fermentoren, Aarhus. Pours hazy red with an offwhite head. Aroma of wheat, light salt, tart fruit, rich raspberry. Flavor is wheat, yeast, light salt, light sourness, tart fruity, raspberries. Medium body, average carbonation, light tart fruity finish. Refreshing. 150616
Very nice colour, not much tartness, low carbonation, some fruityness, but really rather boring stuff.

UPDATED: JUN 15, 2016 Tap at Fermentoren Aarhus. Pours a deep reddish pink. Lots of sweet aromas of rasberries. Perhaps jammy artificial raspberry. Also a bit of citrus and candy. Taste is sour, with some wheat sweetness. Resembles sour candy. Crisp mouthfeel.

Tap @ Fermentoren, Aarhus. Hazy deep red with an off-white head. Aroma is sweet, malty, raspberry and light milky sour. Flavor is medium sweet and light sour. Dry and light sour finish with a slight salty edge. 150616

21/V/16 - 33cl bottle from Bierhalle Deconinck (Vichte) @ Erwin뇹 Ponton Tasting - BB: 6/VI/16 (2016-613) Thanks to ElManana+1 for sharing the bottle!
Little cloudy vague red to somewhat red orange beer, small irregular reddish to yellow head, unstable, non adhesive. Aroma: lots and lots of raspberry candy, almost artificial, notes of bubble gum. MF: ok carbon, medium to light body. Taste: wow, very very sour, acidic, fruity, bit of raspberries. Aftertaste: very acidic, vinegar touch, lots of raspberries, bit of tannins, quite metallic in the finish.

Bottled. Pours slightly hazy purple with an average pink head. Aroma of citrus, lemon zest and raspberries. Slightly sweet flavor with a little salt that ends up being dry and tart. Light bodied, watery to oily texture. A very nice Gose. 游游游游

Bottle (from UJH, Tallinn). Pours red with pinkish head. The head doesn뇺 stay. Aroma is lacto, raspberriess, sweetness. Flavor is sweet and sour, raspberries, lacto, acidic notes, some salt. Overall: I like raspberries, but this is the kind of lacto nonsense I don뇺 usually like. At least it doesn뇺 have very noticeable popcorn flavors (hence rating stays 2.5+).
Bottle at Dangerous bottleshares 20th edition!! Featuring Zakoon and Aaron. Reddish pour with a decent head. Notes of juicy berries, raspberries and some cherry. Tart and refreshing!

Served at Omnipollos Hatt in Stockholm with some raspberry ice on top. Deep pink colour with a frothy white head (though that might just be the crushed ice). Aroma is a lot of raspberry with some distant tartness. Taste is sour raspberries, plenty of salt, and a tart finish. I don뇺 care if it makes me look like less of a man, this is tasty as fuck.
Bottle at Erwin's place. Very sour, raspberry, light salt taste, still very fruity and nice.

Bottle at Dangerous bottleshares 20th edition!! Featuring Zakoon and Aaron. This one thanks to Klimaet. Pouts a murky reddish with a small pinkish white head. Aroma has a lot of hops, raspberry, vanilla, lactose. Taste is very sour though, vanilla-raspberry triffli or something. Somewhat bitter finish. Nice, but not pointing in many different directions. High carbonation and a light, crisp body.
Bottle thanks to Rob. At Koelschip tasting. Pours a lovely vivid purple with a pink head. Aroma is raspberries and yoghurt. Taste is raspberry sweet, lacto, salty.

Aroma of raspberry, vanilla, generic berry sweetness, wheat. 
Pours turbid red, one finger tan head. 
Taste is highly sour on the aftertaste and light to medium sweet at first. 
Medium body, creamy mouthfeel, soft carbonation and sour raspberry finish. 
Very tasteful and impressing for its abv.
backlog. Bright purple with a pink head. Aroma is sour raspberries, loads of lacto. Huge on the raspberries, with hints of diacetyl and lacto in the finish. decent.

duft: hindb칝r sm친 r칮de b칝r intens frugt smag 
smag hindb칝r sur t칮r r칮d intens r칮d frugt
Flaska fr친n Beergium. Smak och doft av hallonshake, hallonsmoothie med smak av hallon, hallonk칛rnor, hallonsorbet. Massor av hallon, v칛ldigt b칛rig, frisk, l칛tt syrlig, lagom s칬tma. Mycket gott!

Bottle from Humlen 칒lutsalg, Bergen. Pours a cloudy purple (!) body with a medium white head. So cool! Nose is blackberries, minerals, soapy herbal tones, white sugar and hints of strawberries and pineapple. Taste is strange muddly fruity tones, including raspberries and blackberries, minerals, salt, soapy herbal notes and hints of sugar, lactic sour notes and rhubarb. Medium body, high carbonation. Weird, all-over-the-place fruity creation from Omnipollo, which have demonstrated their lack of conventionalism on several occasions. Unfortunately, this does not equal excellence. A decent enough sour, but not something I뇫 like to try more than once.

33cl bottle at home, from online web order. Poured a very deep red to purple colour with a purple head on top. Nose of lactose, tart notes, deep intense raspberry aroma, citrus notes. Taste is like the best raspberry lemonade, slight wheat notice, salty, but tart. Leading to a sour tart aftertaste. Awesome beer with such an low abv. Better compared to the blueberry version

V칛rdig platsen som min 300:e rating! Fat p친 Bishops, 칐rebro. Tjockt, fylligt r칬d med l칛tt rosa toner. Inte det minsta tillstymmelse till genomskinlighet. Litet rosavitt skum. Doftar av hallon-proviva, bl친b칛rssoppa och tranb칛rsjuice - det liksom n칛stan doftar tr칬gflytande! Ganska pigg kropp, friskare och framf칬r allt l칛ttare 칛n den ser ut. Torr. Stramar 친t rej칛lt p친 tungspetsen. Smakm칛ssigt l칛tt i inledningen, men l칛tt s칬ta och fruktiga/b칛riga toner. G친r strax 칬ver i intensiv, riktigt bitande syra. T칛nk s친na d칛r sm친 r칬da supersyrliga kolaflaskor i l칬sgodiset... I 칬vrigt 칛r det en del svarta och r칬da vinb칛r. 츿ven en del h칬 och bittra stalltoner. Avslutas n친got bittert. Bra 칬verg친ng mellan inledande, subtil s칬tma, till supersyrligt klimax och sedan l칛tt bitter avslutning. F칬r 칬vrigt en riktigt snygg 칬l utseendem칛ssigt.

Bottle from Saveur-Biere.com - Color: opaque red purple beer with no carbonation and really small white foam. Smell: lassi nose domination, lactic and sourness. Taste: light body with raspberry juice blast. Very intensive taste. Balanced with tart taste and superb sourness. Very great equilibrium. I really like it. Astringent taste and really fruity finish. Amazing ! Aftertaste: astringent with raspberry. Superb fruity and lactic finish. I didn뇺 like so much the mango version but this one is really brilliant !
Grumlig och dimmig, r칬d, rosa skum. Doft: Hallonkr칛m, syrligt, hallonsorbet. Smak: Syrlig hallonkr칛m, citronsyra, lite funk, lite j칛stigt.
330ml bottle, 3,5 version. Hazy red body with a medium head. Raspberries, lactose and citrus pretty much. Medium/low co2.
Leraktig r칬dgr칬n v칛tska. Inte mycket bubblor. Smakar salt, surt och mycket hallon. Fantastisk folk칬l!

330 ml bottle. Pours unclear flashy cherry red, small to no head. Intense raspberry flavour, more of a lemonade than a beer, but incredibly good. Light body with a clear wheat undertone, sour-saltiness is clearly there. Taste is salty raspberry. Puckering dry end and sour aftertaste.

2x flessen gekocht via Saveur Bi칟re, gedeeld tijdens proefavond, uitgeschonken in Struise glazen. Prachtige zeer troebele diep roze kleur, met een bruisende medium hoge roze schuimkraag die zich snel terugtrekt. Ik heb nog niet eerder een bier gezien met deze kleur, erg fraai gedaan van Omnipollo. De aroma뇹 zijn zeer fruitig, verfrissend en zurig, met de intense tonen van frambozen die alles overheersen. Een fruitigheid die lijkt op frambozenjam, tropisch fruit, grapefruit, vanille en iets van lactose als in yoghurt of karnemelk. Het smaakpallet is in eerste instantie heel zuur en fruitig, het lijkt bijna op puur vers geperst frambozensap, of gemalen bevroren frambozen. Na deze zure smaakexplosie, komen de mildere en meer cr칟me achtige notities van de yoghurt naar voren, romig met frisse tonen van limoen en lichte hop. Een verdere balans in de smaak wordt gevonden door de ziltige mineraal smaken van het toegevoegde zout. Het mondgevoel is romig en de afdronk is lang en droog, ziltig en fruit zurig van de frambozen met een prikkelende carbonatie en een zachte hopbitter in de finish. Ook dit bier van Omipollo is zeer bijzonder, prachtig in balans, zowel in aroma, smaakpallet en de ongelooflijk lange afdronk voor een bier met een dergelijk laag alcoholpercentage, was gelijk ook de eerste Gose die ik ooit heb geproefd.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Draught. Pours slightly hazy and in beautiful reddish rasspberry like colour, w very small head. Aroma of taet raspberries, some citrus and lacto notes. In taste medium sour with great raspberry flavour. Finish is tart and dry. Very nice one.
Keg at ushers.. Hazy pink red... Thin white lacing... Soft strawberry.. Light tart fruits nose... Zezty fruits.. Massive raspberry.. Light strawberry.. Juicy fruits

On tap at Christian Firtal Swedish Tap Takeover. Cloudy red with a small pink head. Light raspberry aroma with a touch of yoghurt. Sweet and slightly tart raspberry flavour with herbal hops. The aftertaste is a clash of slightly bitter and slightly tart.

Bottle at home. Pours a dark, bright, completely opaque red. Gorgeous head that, as others have said, makes this delicious beer look quite ridiculous: a smoothie on steroids. Wafts of raspberry, full, round, mildly sour in the mouth with a long finish. Again, please.
Sample at C4. Hazy red body with a small pinkish head. Raspberries, tart, spices, vinegar notes, red berries, salty. Great.
Sample c4. Pours muddy pink with a pink head. Aroma raspberry,light salt, herbal, lactose, hoppy like notes. Taste is raspberry yogurt, sour, tarty, hoppy, grape, quite dry.

Lukt: Jordb칝r og tyggis.
Utseende: Rosa.
Skum/kullsyre: Tynt skum.
Smak: Sylig, jordb칝r, bringeb칝r og tyggis.

How: Draught.
Where: The Bishops Arms Vasagatan, Stockholm.
Appearance: Hazy red colour with a pink head.
Aroma: Raspberries, citrus, malt, fruit.
Body: Medium body and carbonation.
Flavour: Raspberries, malt, some tropical fruit, a bit sour.

33cl bottle from saveur-biere.com. Nice dense rose red color. Thin rose head. Taste is medium sour, light sweetness. Very nice thick body. Aroma is raspberries and milk. Best gose I have ever had I think.

Flaska fr친n beergium. Ser ut som en hallonshake eller smoothie med rej칛l skumluva. Stor fantastisk doft av hallon 친t hallonsorbet och fantastisk smak. Massor av hallon, v칛ldigt b칛rig, frisk med en liten s칛lta. Torr l칛tt syrlig avslutning. Wow!

Opaque pink grapefruit color with pink head, looks absolutely ridiculous. Aroma is full-on strawberry milkshake. Taste starts tart and really fruity with intense raspberry and strawberry notes. Finishes dry and tart. Thick body with crisp carbonation. Another special beer from Omnipollo and, as usual, it뇹 great.
Keg at Ushers. Pours hazy pink/red. Nose is tart and sweet raspberries. Tastes tart, raspberries, funky, good stuff.

330 ml bottle. Pours a beautiful cloudy red colour with a firm white head. Aroma of extremely strong raspberry jam, a bit of quark and sea water. Flavour of lovely tart raspberries, raspberry seeds, quark and some mild floral notes. The saltiness shows itself after a while. Dry mouthfeel. Extremely good drinkability. Wow. I need more. Pretty much captures the whole idea of a fruit/berry gose. Respect.

33 cl bottle.
Pours murky rosehip red color with a small pink head, very unique appearance. Quite nice aroma of rose hip, raspberries, some grapefruits and lemon. Flavor has grapefruits, lemon, raspberries, rose hip, mandarin. Tart, lingers for a long time. Very weird but I like this.
3345

330ml bottle (3,5%). Pours deep red with a smooth head. Aroma of tart raspberries, milkshake notes, vanilla, smooth fruitiness, hints of hops. Taste is smooth, juicy and tartish with loads of raspberries, vanilla, milkshake notes, hints of saltiness and funky tartness. Finish is salty, sourish and milky with some juicy raspberries and tartish notes. Refreshing and tasty.

Bottle.
Lovely appearance! Deep pink, hazy
Aroma of matured raspberry and milkshake 
Taste lovely sour, raspberry, quite clean 
Typical omnipollo
Keg at ushers. Pours murky pink, nose is raspberry, yoghurt, light funk, taste is juicy raspberry, tart, creamy.

Bottled from Ica 칀kered
Deep ruby with a pinkish head. 
Tart raspberries in aroma and flavour. . 
Light body. Very refreshing.

Aroma: Smelling of butter, raspberries, clove and yeast.Appearance: A clouded red colored beer. A low pink head with small lacing and good curtains.Taste: Tasting bread, mango, sour raspberries, spices and yeast.Palate: Low carbonation, a watery texture. A small body with a somewhat dry finish.Overall: Very raspberry and rather funky.Note: Bottle 330 ml at home. Reviewed 2016-03-10.

Draught @ Banksia Food & Beer, Gothersgade 8D, Copenhagen, Denmark 1123. [ As Omnipollo Bianca Raspberry Lassi Gose ].Murky matt medium to dark red - blood marry color with a average, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, off-white - pink head. Aroma is moderate malty, pale malt, wheat, raspberry, rapsberry jam. Flavor is moderate sweet and light acidic with a long duration, tart raspberry, frozen raspberry, light salty water. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is flat. [20160124]

3.5% version from the supermarket. Looks and smells like a raspberry smoothie, absolutely opaque. Taste has more lactic sourness, reminds of filmj칬lk with raspberries. Full creamy body, really feels like drinking some youghurt-based concoction. Just enough salt. Bravo, Omnipollo! Looking forward to the blueberry version.
Flaska fr친n ica. M칬rkcerise med rosa skum. H칛rlig hallondoft som p친minner om hallonkr칛m. Syrlig och frisk smak med mycket hallon.

Draft @ S칬der Om Sm친land, Malm칬. Pours a hazy red color with a small white head. Has a fruity weak sour raspberry aroma. Fruity weak sour berry raspberry flavor. Has a fruity weak sour raspberry finish.
@ Hatten 16-2-12: r칛tt trevlig fruktig doft. Smaken 칛r trevligt syrlig med fr칛scha frukttoner av hallon. Gott.

R칬d/rosa 칬l med rosa skum. Mycket hallon b친de i doft och smak. Tycker denna 칛r sjukt lagom vad g칛ller beska, surhet, s칬tma. Riktigt bra! Man vill bara ha mer.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Bottle. Opaque red beer with a small white head. Aroma is fruity with notes of citrus, raspberries, herbs, hay and dough. Flavor is fruity with notes of citrus, raspberries, dough, herbs and salt.

Pours a milky raspberry with a frothy light red head. Aromas of raspberry, citrus, funk, red currant, milk. Taste is very fruity and tart with medium body and lively carbonation. Very good!Earlier Rating: 11/13/2015 Total Score: 3.8Pours a creamy milky raspberry with a medium light red head. Aromas of raspberry, vanilla, red currant, citrus. Taste is fruity sour with a light bitter note. Mouthfeel is tart abd dry with a creamy feel. Very good!
330ml bottle from Ica Medborgarplatsen. Opaque pale red, medium size, short-lasting white head. Tart aroma with phenols and red berries. Tart taste lemon, citrus zest, raspberry jam and yoghurt.

Keg @ Omnipollo뇹 Hatt, Stockholm, topped with raspberry slush from their own slushy machine. Vivid pink with light raspberry aroma. Taste is vibrant, intense raspberry with the rock salt creating a crisp dry finish. Really unlike anything I뇼e had before. Not overly sweet or cloying thanks to the salt. And the raspberry slush is a perfect accompaniment to the beer. I really hope I can get some of this in the summer!

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Draught at 칐lstugan Tullen Lejonet, G칬teborg, Sweden. Murky ruby, medium pink head. Fruity, bberryish aroma with clear notes of raspberry and yougurth. Medium bodied, mmedium carbonation. Semi dry, medium acidity.
Draft. An unclear red beer with a pink head. The aroma has notes of raspberries, lacto, and malt. The flavor is acidic with notes of lacto, raspberries, and malt, leading to a tart finish.
On tap at hatten. Opaque red with whiteish head. Aroma is fruity, tart, yoghurt, red berries and raspberry. Taste is similar, tart yoghurt, red berries, sweetish notes (lactose?), fruit and berries.

Keg at Bottle Shop - Bermondsey. Pours murky purple with a creamy, white head. The nose has a lot of vibrant, juicy fruit notes, hearty raspberry, cherry. Light to medium sweet flavor, jammy, lots of seedy raspberry, some creamy aspect. Light bodied with fine to average carbonation. Sweet finish, lightly tangy, some tart raspberry, more jam, cherry, peach. Very tasty beer.

Keg at the bottle shop druid street. Opaque closed bright pink / red coloured pour with a a lasting fluffy oink head. Milky purple. Aroma is tart raspberry, yougurt funk, petrol, salty mineral and sharp citrus. Flavour is composed of tart sharp funky raspberry sour, really unique, salty sharp citrus. Palate is sharp medium full, yogurt funk, highish carbonation. Crisp and tart refreshing finish. Really like it. Very unique

(On tap @ Omnipollos Hatt, Jan 2 2016) Pours murky fairly dark pink with the pale pink frozen soft serve head on top. Aromas of raspberry, pineapple juice, orange rind, lemon juice and yoghurt, a bit sweet and creamy but mostly tart and juicy. A little tart powdered fruit candy character. Palate is really about raspberry with orange and lemon zests complementing the fruitiness. Creamy and yoghurty with some lemon lacto acidity, and a bit of sea salt and grass coming up in the lightly tart and fairly dry finish. Aftertaste is lightly butter with raspberry seeds and grapefruit peel. Medium body, prickly mouth filling carb. The soft serve head is really fun even if it blocks the aroma until it뇹 gone. The underlying beer is a good blend of fruity, salty and creamy. Quality fruited gose.
Grumligt r칬d kropp med rosa skumkrona. Smak av hallon och r칬da vinb칛r. Salt och vin칛ger. Syra som krusar i munnen. Frisk.

UPDATED: DEC 20, 2015 Keg at bottle shop. It pours cloudy bright deep pink with a small white head. The nose is fresh, bitter - sweet, raspberry sorbet, salty, minerals, earth, creaminess and coriander. The taste is crisp, bitter, tart, minerals, source raspberry, white grape, good mouth - pucker, creaminess, touch of acidity, drying wood and lemony sherbet with a dry finish. Medium body and moderate, prickly carbonation. Well rounded, tart, fruity and delicious!

December 12, 2015. On tap at Omnipollos Hatt. 
Very cloudy red with a small pinkish (regular, no icecream) head. Aroma is lots of fresh jammy raspberries, some lemon, grain and yoghurt. Taste is sour and berry forward with a salty and light sweet touch. Finish is tart raspberries and lemon, light saltiness, some mineral and yoghurt notes. Medium bodied, quite creamy with a dry finish, soft to average carbonation. 
Very good and berry-forward!

Draught. Pours an opaque pink with no head. Aroma of salt, raspberry, pine, tart red fruits. Taste is tart, cherries, raspberry, salt, bitter fruits, vanilla. Viscous, oily mouthfeel, medium to hard carbonation.

Draught at Jerntorgets Brygghus, G칬teborg. Cloudy reddish beet with a decent off white head. Sourish raspberry aroma, grapes, hay notes, cream, some bread. Sourish raspberry flavor, earthy, floral, some orange zest and yoghurt. Quite nice.

Sample at All In Beer Fest. Dense pink with frozen pink head. Heavy raspberry aroma. The taste was more or less harsh bitter raspberry pips, maybe my palate was wrecked, but this was just not fruity at all.

Pours milky raspberry with light pink head
Aromas are raspberries, milky, salty, juicy
Taste has raspberries, salty mouthfeel, caramel, spices

Fat bishops 칐rebro. Tjock och fyllig r칬d v칛tska med rosa skum. Frisk, syrlig och unken doft av j칛sta hallon. 
Kraftfull smak av syrliga f칛rska hallon toppat med havssalt. En riktig upplevelse i munnen och faktiskt mycket god

Big aroma of tart raspberries, redcurrants, yoghurt. Taste very yoghurty with a nice raspberry kick, ever so slight sweetness on the end, and a bit mort tart then the mango version. Great creamy thick mouthfeel.

Pours murky raspberry red with nearly flat light pink head. Looks like raspberry juice, pretty much. Aroma of wild raspberries, light salt, some baking soda. Basically the raspberries are a bit more subdued than I would have expected. Taste is raspberry tart with light berry sweetness kicking in after the initial sour hit. Body is light and crisp with about average carbonation.
Draught @ Hatten. Tart, sweet and intensly fruity. Has a somewhat "perfumed" fruitiness in the aftertaste. Ends dry. Fun and drinkable!

Draught at Hatten. 
Pours hazy red. 
Sweet fruity taste of raspberry with raspberry seed bitterness.

On tap at Omnipollos Hatt. 

Hazy reddish/pink with a small bubbly head. A bit tart aroma of raspberries, some lemon and light bread. Similar taste. The body was on the light side. Really refreshing and easy to drink. I would like to drink this during a hot summer day.

Draught @ All In Beer Fest 2015. Served with some kind of strange soft serve beer ice cream on top which in a way was nice but did distract you from the actual beer here. Pours hazy milky red with a bith a rather big frothy pinkish white head that slowly dissipates while leaving a small trace on the glass. Smell is heavy fruity with crackers, lemon juice, lime juice, raspberries, blackberries, yoghurt, grass, minerals, orange zest and lemon zest. Taste is sour, slightly bitter, slightly salty and fruity. Mouthfeel is dry, tart, astringent and medium bodied. Finish is sour, slightly bitter and slightly salty with crackers, saltines, lemon juice, raspberries, unripe blackberries, cherries, mango, yoghurt, grass, minerals and lemon zest. Pity it was served with that soft serve head. Doesn뇺 do much to enhance the beer and dulls your senses being ice cold. I suspect this is a 4+ beer if served like it should. Will revisit and rerate if given the chance!

All In Beerfest 2015: Supposed to be a "soft serve" but the machine wasn뇺 coping with the pressure. Aroma of raspberries (gasp) with a citrusy cloak. Taste once again raspberries, but also a kind of herbal approach that made it taste a bit more "meaty". Very refreshing.
On tap at All In Beer Fest. Fruity smell with berries. Similar taste Light tart. Milky and creamy. I also tried this as a slush (they froze it down in a slush machine). Very nice!

Draught at All In Beer Fest 2015. Hazy deep pink liquid with medium light pink head. Aroma of raspberries, light lemon, light grain, red currant and herbs. Taste is light sweet and medium sour with notes of raspberries, lemon, lime leaves and red currant. Light to medium bodied with medium carbonation. Super nice!
